医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究将全氟烷基物质暴露与儿童哮喘表型联系起来研究评估了接触全氟烷基物质对哮喘表型的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/New-study-links-per氟烷基-substance-exposure-to-childhood-asthma-phenotypes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/New-study-links-per氟烷基-substance-exposure-to-childhood-asthma-phenotypes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df8c816d-4fa0-4507-88cd-1cd8bf6173fe Thu, 13 Jul 2023 06:04:00 -0400 New study links perfluoroalkyl substance exposure to childhood asthma phenotypes
美国各地零售牛奶中的碘含量差异很大研究人员调查了美国各地零售牛奶中的碘含量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Iodine-content-in-retail-cowe28099s-milk-varies-dramatically-across-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Iodine-content-in-retail-cowe28099s-milk-varies-dramatically-across-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8be6e78c-8844-4d96-84b5-0da45f5ce502 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 05:08:00 -0400 Iodine content in retail cow’s milk varies dramatically across the U.S.
青春期长期接触高氟化物会导致海马损伤研究人员评估了青春期和成年期长期接触氟化物对认知和相关海马体变化的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Long-term-high-fluide-exposure-during-adolescent-causes-hippocampal-impairments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Long-term-high-fluide-exposure-during-adolescent-causes-hippocampal-impairments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75896529-ed1d-4f95-a40c-120d87234263 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 04:16:00 -0400 Long-term high fluoride exposure during adolescence causes hippocampal impairments
根据全球健康安全指数衡量的 COVID-19 超额死亡率研究人员比较了 183 个国家的 COVID-19 超额死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/COVID-19-excess-mortality-measured-by-the-Global-Health-Security-Index.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/COVID-19-excess-mortality-measured-by-the-Global-Health-Security-Index.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f98fcc4f-f0a1-4172-a619-79979ee5e63a Thu, 13 Jul 2023 03:50:00 -0400 COVID-19 excess mortality measured by the Global Health Security Index
加州大学洛杉矶分校研究人员证实突变使患者容易患罕见肾癌综合征加州大学洛杉矶分校琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员证实，大量意义不明的基因变异实际上是经过验证的突变，这些突变使患者容易患上罕见的遗传综合征，从而增加患肾癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/UCLA-researchers-confirm-mutations-that-predispose-病人-to-rare-kidney-cancer-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/UCLA-researchers-confirm-mutations-that-predispose-患者-to-rare-kidney-cancer-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8107574f-faf8-4e7e-bf0c-a829eba8809e Thu, 13 Jul 2023 00:35:35 -0400 UCLA researchers confirm mutations that predispose patients to rare kidney cancer syndrome
肥大细胞充当传感器，帮助避免有害抗原肥大细胞是免疫系统的一部分，其功能仍然是一个谜。德国癌症研究中心（DKFZ）的科学家现已在小鼠身上证明：肥大细胞充当传感器，向动物发出信号以避免抗原，包括有害的过敏原，从而保护自己免受危及健康的炎症反应的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Mast-cells-act-as-sensors-to-help-avoid-harmful-antigens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Mast-cells-act-as-sensors-to-help-avoid-harmful-antigens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcbea232-4ae2-45e0-ac8c-157556af9889 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 23:49:00 -0400 Mast cells act as sensors to help avoid harmful antigens
研究显示派姆单抗联合疗法对晚期非小细胞肺癌有效虽然派姆单抗已被批准用于治疗 III 期非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 患者，但只有部分患者对此疗法有反应。研究人员表示，治疗失败通常是由肿瘤微环境的差异引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Pembrolizumab-combination-therapies- effective-for-advanced-NSCLC-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Pembrolizumab-combination-therapies- effective-for-advanced-NSCLC-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74760bda-fc14-4db1-92b7-5e154fd5f261 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 23:23:03 -0400 Pembrolizumab combination therapies effective for advanced NSCLC, study shows
研究：大流行期间转向远程医疗并没有阻止人们寻求心理健康服务根据美国咨询协会期刊《咨询与发展杂志》发表的研究结果，在 COVID-19 大流行期间寻求心理健康服务的人们并没有因远程医疗服务的广泛转变而却步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Study-Shift-to-telehealth-during-the-pandemic-did-not-deter-people-seeking-mental-health-services.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Study-Shift-to-telehealth-during-the-pandemic-did-not-deter-people-seeking-mental-health-services.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9b3c7ac-58ad-4682-b19f-6ccacb7c88e1 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 23:20:20 -0400 Study: Shift to telehealth during the pandemic did not deter people seeking mental health services
华盛顿大学外科医生开创了机器人肝移植圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院的外科团队最近于五月份在巴恩斯犹太医院进行了美国首例机器人肝脏移植手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Washington-University-surgeons-pioneer-robotic-liver-transplantation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Washington-University-surgeons-pioneer-robotic-liver-transplantation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7423f60a-0eb0-432c-84cb-566b4a81677f Wed, 12 Jul 2023 23:16:36 -0400 Washington University surgeons pioneer robotic liver transplantation
研究人员开发出一种逆转衰老的化学方法在一项开创性的研究中，研究人员开辟了对抗衰老和与年龄相关疾病的新领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Researchers-develop-a-chemical-approach-to-reverse-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Researchers-develop-a-chemical-approach-to-reverse-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0b311ea-d917-405b-9855-797df46c8dc7 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 23:14:37 -0400 Researchers develop a chemical approach to reverse aging
